desc: Fur Indoors Bridgend brings a whole new meaning to Dog Boarding. We have both indoor and outdoor dog parks, dog boarding kennels and dog behaviourists.

layout.text: Not only do Fur Indoors have both indoor and outdoor dog parks which you can attend with your dogs to enjoy watching them socialise, play and maybe work on generalising what they have learnt in training, but we have a luxury dog hotel and doggy daycare centre too.    BOOK NOW  Ask us a question Got a question about our services? Send us a message now!
